## TextElement.updateMinMaxZoomLevelsFromPoiInfo() method

Update the minZoomLevel and maxZoomLevel from the values set in \[\[PoiInfo\]\]. Selects the smaller/larger one of the two min/max values for icon and text, because the TextElement is a container for both.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateMinMaxZoomLevelsFromPoiInfo(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
